description:
Danny welcomes the grande dame of The Real Housewives of Potomac, Karen Huger! They discuss the new season, her relationship with the other women, avoiding the vow renewal curse, what's next for La Dame, and SO much more!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
